data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Seung-Gyu, Ahn, Kee-Jeong (2017): A taxonomic review of the Korean species of the subgenus Datomicra Mulsant & Rey of the genus Atheta Thomson, with description of a new species (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 4268 (4): 508-522, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4268.4.3|38 occurrences
